name: phpBB Directory
body:
## Installation
You can install this extension on the latest version of [phpBB 3.1](https://www.phpbb.com/downloads/) by doing the following:

1. Download the extension by downloading the [latest ZIP-archive of `master` branch of its GitHub repository](https://github.com/ErnadoO/ext-phpbb-directory/archive/master.zip).
2. Check out the existing of the folder `/ext/ernadoo/ext-phpbb-directory/` in the root of your board folder. Create folders if necessary.
3. Copy the contents of the downloaded `ext-phpbb-directory-master` folder to `/ext/ernadoo/ext-phpbb-directory/`.
4. Navigate in the ACP to `Customise -> Extension Management -> Manage extensions -> Upload Extensions`.
5. Click `Enable`.

## Update
1. Download the updated extension.
2. Navigate in the ACP to `Customise -> Extension Management -> Manage extensions -> phpBB Directory` and click `Disable`.
3. Remove the contents of the folder `/ext/ernadoo/ext-phpbb-directory/`
4. Copy the contents of the downloaded `ext-phpbb-directory-master` folder to `/ext/ernadoo/ext-phpbb-directory/`.
5. Navigate in the ACP to `Customise -> Extension Management -> Manage extensions -> phpBB Directory` and click `Enable`.

## Uninstallation
Navigate in the ACP to `Customise -> Extension Management -> Manage extensions -> phpBB Directory` and click `Disable`.

For permanent uninstallation click `Delete Data` and then you can safely delete the `/ext/ernadoo/ext-phpbb-directory/` folder.
